sentences.en: An override of the veto appears unlikely.
sentences.cn: 看来推翻这项否决的可能性很小。

sentences.en: Donna might be able to come tomorrow, but it’s very unlikely.
sentences.cn: 唐娜明天也许能来，不过这可能性很小。

sentences.en: He and Paula made an unlikely pair.
sentences.cn: 他和葆拉不太可能成为一对儿。

sentences.en: He is unlikely to send in the army to quell nationalist aspirations.
sentences.cn: 他不可能派兵去扼杀民族主义理想。

sentences.en: His chosen field was unlikely to be a meal ticket for life.
sentences.cn: 他选的这一行是不可能赖以为生的。

sentences.en: It is unlikely he would have mistaken hocus-pocus for genuine knowledge.
sentences.cn: 他不可能把骗人的把戏错当成真正的知识。

sentences.en: It is unlikely that the Duke was convinced by such specious arguments.
sentences.cn: 公爵不太可能相信这种似是而非的论点。

sentences.en: It is unlikely that the rebels will agree to demobilise.
sentences.cn: 叛军不太可能会同意解散武装。

sentences.en: It seems highly unlikely that she ever existed.
sentences.cn: 她好像压根就没存在过。

sentences.en: It was highly unlikely that their paths would cross again.
sentences.cn: 他们再次偶遇的可能性非常小。

sentences.en: It's now unlikely that future parliaments will bring back the death penalty.
sentences.cn: 现在看来，将来议会不太可能恢复死刑。

sentences.en: It's unlikely that you'll be asked to do anything too taxing.
sentences.cn: 不大可能叫你做什么太费劲的事儿。

sentences.en: Offers 15% below the asking price are unlikely to be accepted.
sentences.cn: 低于要价15％的报价不大可能被接受。

sentences.en: The controversy is unlikely to die down.
The man has become an unlikely figure of fun.
sentences.cn: 令人想象不到的是，这个男人已经成为了笑谈。

sentences.en: The new media are unlikely to prove qualitatively different from the old.
sentences.cn: 新媒体不可能与旧媒体有质的差别。

words.tran_cn: 不可信；未必有；不大可能的事

trans.tran_cn: 不大可能的，非想象的，难以置信的
